features: Fights tough odors and 100% of stain types* Bleachable, oily/waxy, enzymatic, particulate
5-in-1 formula with superior OXI power that fights odors, whitens, brightens, and freshens vs. all fresh clean sunshine fresh detergent
Formulated for use in all water temperatures, including cold water
Works with all washing machine types, including high efficiency (HE) machines
This package contains one 60-count tub of single-dose laundry detergent pacs
body.description: Bring in serious cleaning muscle for your worst stains with all Oxi Liquid Laundry Detergent. Full of concentrated cleaning power with Oxi that whitens and brightens your clothes. With Active Stainlifters and in-wash, pre-treaters to fight your toughest stains. These Mighty Pacs are safe to use in any washing machine and any water temperature. Leave your clothes smelling clean with a fresh scent. This package includes 1 tub of 60 all Mighty Pacs with Oxi, enough for 60 loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: all is for the families who have their priorities straight. The ones who do laundry like they have better things to do. And then go do them. The ones who throw an armload of whatever colors into the washer. Pour detergent straight from the bottle. And pick from the clean pile (on the floor). The ones who make messes to make memories. And never think twice... About jumping in that puddle. Slurping that spaghetti. Sliding into home. all is for the families who put life before laundry. And to us, all of that… is all good

all stainlifters fights tough stains, whitens, brightens, and has a fresh scent to leave your clothes clean and smelling fresh. With the 4-in-1 cleaning power of all laundry detergent, you don’t have to think twice about jumping in that puddle or slurping that spaghetti. Don’t be afraid of the mess! all laundry detergent is formulated with active stainlifters and in-wash pre-treaters* to fight your toughest stains including grass, mud, and chocolate. *formulated with enzymes for a great clean. all mighty pacs contain a concentrated liquid detergent that provides active cleaning for your clothes. The formula has been concentrated and adapted to fit into the small pacs while still helping you attack tough kid stains. Powerful clean, mighty results. all stainlifter detergents are the champions of stain removal. Full of concentrated cleaning power and In-Wash Pre-Treaters. Stainlifter has been effectively lifting tough kid stains for over 50 years.

for messy fun families Wanna play? all stainlifters detergent tackles family-size messes with a can’t-miss clean. Its 4-in-1 power fights tough stains on all things ooey, gooey and squishy. So if you’re a one bottle kind of family, this one’s it. all Original detergent has a 4-in-1 cleaning power that fights tough stains, whitens, brightens, and has a fresh scent. for up-for-anything families Messy fun means making mud pies & taking day trips. Chasing creepy crawlers & chomping chocolate-y goodness. All that, is all good-- because all OXI detergent has our best stainfighting to handle messes for all ages. all OXI detergent has a 4-in-1 cleaning power that fights 100% of stain types*, whitens, brightens, and has a fresh scent. for super sporty families Give your family a clean they can make believe in. Where it’s those smelly soccer socks or that muddy puddle made for jumping, all Odor Lifter detergent tackles tough odors for families that go all in. all Odor Lifter detergent has a 4-in-1 cleaning power that tackles tough odors, whitens, brightens, and has a fresh scent. Original OXI Odor Lifter

Original OXI Odor Lifter Free Clear Free Clear Odor Relief High Efficiency (HE) Compatible (Optimized for use in all machines) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Safe for Colors & Whites ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Can be used in any Water Temperature ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Boosted Cleaning Power ✓ ✓ Odor Fighting ✓ With Fresh Scent ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ Perfume & Dye Free ✓ ✓ Pre-Measured ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Available in Liquid ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great job for the money and love the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with my clean laundry
reviews.reviewText: Convenient laundry tabs. They are premeasured with the needed detergent to clean a load of laundry. Toss one in and you’re done. Easy to use. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & value
reviews.reviewText: Great product & value. Having a front loading washer these work a lot better. Good for those with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They sometimes don't completely dissolve
reviews.reviewText: They smell great and work pretty good but sometimes they don't realy dissolve. So be sure to check before putting your clothes in the dryer because it turns into weird glueness so you have to wash them again! That's my only complaint otherwise they work pretty good :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only pod I’ll use
reviews.reviewText: We can only use ALL detergent! Great for sensitive skin and washes clothes great!! Convenient pods are perfect too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I break out in hives with Tide, but I love the convenience of the pods. This was a great replacement and my skin never breaks out and it smells very good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: These ALL laundry pods are very easy to use. They arrived without being melted or clumped together. Actually, they were packaged very well.I started using these when I found them on a deal on the store and it's more convenient to have them on subscribe and save through Amazon. I can use one pod and be good with a typical load but it does give instructions on how much to use for what type of load.I stopped using powder or liquid detergent because it was hard on my shoulder (previous injury) and the pods just make is so much easier to do laundry without the mess or hassle of powder or liquid containers.Anyway, these are a good deal for the price and can be conveniently purchased on a repeat order on Subscribe & Save (occasionally they have been out but different scents are available to replace).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two for large load
reviews.reviewText: Gets everything really clean and smells great. Hard to find in grocery stores.
Other than it took almost a month to arrive everything’s good.
